r.s: A php interface to the Spread toolkit API
r.d: Provides a full interface to the Spread group communication toolkit API. Information on Spread can be found at http://www.spread.org/
r.n: - fix zts build (patch from Alexey Zakhlestin) -fix config scrip - fix bug #13965 (spread_receive() should be able to wait forever). (patch from Alexey Zakhlestin) - 64 bit fixes - prevent potential overflow calling multicast - fix name collision with curl. (patch by Alexey Zakhlestin)
